title: Patch 6.6 Bugs are Overwhelming, Can we Get an Update on the Mac OSX FPS Drop Fix?
body:
Its been several days since this bug has been announced and recognized across the community as well as acknowledged by several Rioters.

What is the update on this? Are we basically boned playing this game until next patch or are you guys just going to stop supporting Mac client.

replies.body:
Here is the latest info on it:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/FqFcbo8c-fps-drops-since-patch-66-running-perfectly-before-the-patch?comment=0001
2 days and no hot fix is kind of a bummer however.

"Just turn the sound down..."

Riot, that isn't a fix. That is laziness.

Hey guys! 

This is way far from my area of expertise (which is skins), but I wanted to pop in and let you know that it appears that we're aware of the issue and are working on a fix.

Thank you very much for the reply Katey,

us Mac users may be few and far between however we just want to play our League :(
You're welcome! Totally understandable, and it's not an outrageous request. :3
I don't know about fps drop but I'm getting random high pings... Even if i connect my computer to the router.
I post this bug everyday after patch 6.6, but NO ONE cares (RIOT).
